events.name: The Masque of the Red Death
events.description: Get cozy for story time! Join Minister Hadrian Flyte as he reads The Masque of the Red Death by Edgar Allan Poe.

events.name: Friends Forever - The Art and History of Reanimating the Dead
events.description: Join Satan's Craft Room for a presentation and discussion on the history, ethics, and art of taxidermy from its origins to its modern applications.

events.name: Your meat suit has an expiry date
events.description: Curious about mortality? Death rituals & Cultivating Death awareness? Death Doula and Satanist Bettie Bune will discuss death, rituals, and daily practice. This is an interactive discussion where we will discuss our mortality and how we can use the reality of our death to create a deeper and more meaningful life.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: Adversarial Deaths: How to Cope with the Death of Your Abuser
events.description: Priestess Shiva Honey shares insights on how to cope with the death of abusers and those with whom we have had complicated relationships. She’ll share excerpts from her new book The Devil’s Death: Your Satanic Companion for Grief and Dying, learnings from her training as a death doula, as well as personal stories about how she dealt with the deaths of her abusive fathers. Stick around after the presentation as DJ Grahamzig + Shiva Honey will follow up with macabre music to get you moving.

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
